This is an Android flipclock app inspired by Yuji Adachi’s work on iOS. But it\'s NOT the official Fliqlo app. I make it for my daily use and for fun. Anyone can use it for free only on Android platform.
v0.5.7-beta Complete UI Redesign & Jetpack Compose Migration

[New] Complete UI redesign with modern Material Design 3 principles, bringing a more refined Braun-inspired aesthetic throughout the app.

[New] Full Jetpack Compose implementation for settings interface, replacing legacy XML layouts with modern declarative UI components.

[New] Redesigned settings button entry points with Compose-based components for consistent visual language.

[Improved] Enhanced clock interface with more realistic and skeuomorphic glass window effect for seconds display.

[Improved] Refined typography system with updated font designs and optimized text rendering effects.

[Improved] Comprehensive UI refresh across all settings pages, maintaining visual consistency and improved usability.

[New] Added lifecycle-aware animation pause/resume for significant battery savings during idle state.


[New] Smart background handling: All flip animations, light effects, and knob inertial scrolling automatically stop when app is backgrounded.


[Improved] Settings menu now properly handles orientation changes without UI clipping issues.


[Improved] Feedback section renamed to "Interaction Feedback" with clearer labels (Tactile Haptics, Mechanical Sound).


[Improved] Custom switch colors: Light Mode uses Braun off-white, Auto-Off Bulb and OLED Protection use Braun green when enabled.


[Refactor] Renamed BraunGreen to ToggleFeatureEnabledGreen for better semantic naming.


[Fixed] Settings bottom sheet layout now recalculates correctly on device rotation.


[Fixed] Various lifecycle cleanup improvements to prevent memory leaks.

[New] Exposed glassy Compose APIs (Modifier.glassyBackdrop, GlassySurface) so theme code can reuse consistent blur/colorization behaviors.


[Improved] Toned down the seconds glass magnification defaults and consolidated parameters into GlassParams for theme-aware configuration (light/dark variants).


[Improved] Centralized typography usage via FontProvider: UI and view rendering now share the same Typeface sources to prevent mismatched metrics.


[Refactor] Reworked Compose settings/button modules to use reusable components (SettingsButtons.kt) and moved glass UI logic into ui/effect and ui/compose packages for clearer separation.


[Fixed] Resolved an Activity context retention leak in haptic initialization by using applicationContext when obtaining the Vibrator (prevents ViewModel -> Vibrator -> Activity leaks).


[Fixed] Normalized switch styling to a neutral monochrome scheme while preserving legacy Reset/Quit action colors to avoid accidental style regressions.


[Notes] Some glass effects rely on platform RenderEffect APIs; fallbacks are applied on older OS versions. Verify visually on devices with API S+ and on Tiramisu if available.

[New] Expanded Control Panel: Added dedicated buttons for Theme Toggle, Light Effect, and Manual Time Adjustment.

[New] Implemented GestureRouter and SystemIntegrationController for robust touch and window management.

[New] Refactored InfiniteKnobView with 2.0x sensitivity and cleaner interaction logic.

[New] Engineered decoupled LightToggleController and ThemeToggleController for granular state management.

[Improved] Enhanced Wake Lock logic with granular control (Always/Charging/System).

[Improved] Refined gear animations (1.8s curve) and removed redundant rotations.

[Improved] Optimized UIStateController to remove Activity dependencies.

[Fixed] Resolved hardware layer leakage in animation extensions.

[Improved] Updated core dependencies to latest stable versions for enhanced reliability.

[Improved] Implemented ID-based classification for theme coloring.

[Fixed] Applied Locale.US to Latin-only font to prevent non-Latin digit rendering issues.

[Fixed] Removed 4 unused imports and dead code (highlightPaint, PowerManager, etc.).

[Fixed] Corrected 'Glass widget' documentation comment (was incorrectly labeled 'Solid').

[Fixed] Eliminated MainActivity hard cast, enabling SettingsBottomSheet compatibility with any host activity.

[Fixed] Eliminated double listener triggering in settings switches.

[Fixed] Corrected isScaleEnabled default value mismatch.

[Fixed] Added lifecycle-safe entrance animation cleanup.

[Improved] Removed unused resetSettings() dead code.

[Improved] Enhanced animation memory safety on view detach.

[New] Implemented home screen widget with TextClock-based live updates.

[New] Added 3D beveled border effect with metallic gradient highlights.

[Improved] Refined settings ripple effects (removed particle/sparkle artifacts).

[Improved] Switched widget to system default font for better compatibility.

[Improved] Optimized project structure (removed 12 unused drawable resources).

v0.2.2 Sound Feedback and Icon Polish

[New] Converted PNG icons to scalable vector drawables.

[Improved] Enhanced full-row click logic for all toggle-based settings.

[New] Redesigned About page with high-quality colorful 3D mascot.

[Improved] Switched to string-level ink boundary measurement for absolute centering.

[Improved] Accelerated UI transitions to 200ms for a snappier experience.

[Fixed] Corrected vertical bias to achieve perfect digit centering.

[Fixed] Eliminated edge artifacts and 'white lines' in Dark Mode.

[Fixed] Resolved automatic screen rotation failures.

[New] Added clickable app icon attribution.

[Improved] Standardized icon styling across Settings.

[Improved] Refined default configuration (12h format, System Default wake).

[Fixed] Resolved touch event conflicts in settings sub-pages.

[Fixed] Corrected Light Mode color resource resolution.

[New] Implemented granular Wake Lock control (Always/Charging/System).

[Improved] Optimized onDraw to minimize object allocation and reduce GC pauses.

[Improved] Refactored hardcoded colors into semantic colors.xml resources.

[New] Implemented smooth in-place rotation transitions.

[Fixed] Aligned AM/PM indicator to digit Cap Height.

[Fixed] Centered digits using absolute pixel bounds.

In this update, I rebuilt the settings menu using Jetpack Compose to make it more reliable and consistent. I also refreshed the visual design with a cleaner lookup and refined the clock animations to be smoother learning from previous versions.

Since the first release, I've added a few features like widgets and a sleep timer because I found them useful for my own daily use.

I also took the opportunity to update the code to better match modern Android standards. I tried to improve the animations and the settings interface to make the app feel a bit smoother. It has been a continuous learning process for me.

My goal has always been to keep the app simple and focused, even as I added these new capabilities. I hope the balance feels right.

I created this app simply because I wanted a clean and focused flip clock for myself.

There are many clock apps available, but I often found them too complex or cluttered for my taste. This project started as a personal attempt to recreate the classic flip clock aesthetic I've always admired, purely for the joy of it.

I tried to stay faithful to the details of the original design, paying attention to things like the digit alignment and the feel of the flip animation. I kept the features minimal on purpose, focusing just on displaying time clearly and quietly.

This is my first Android app, and it has been a huge learning experience. I relied heavily on documentation, open-source examples, and AI tools to figure things out. I'm grateful to proper attribution and the community for all the resources that made this possible.

I hope you find it useful for your own desk or nightstand.
